articles.title: Brazilian-Spanish couple’s Jharkhand horror: Brazil embassy reaches out, 3 apprehended - WION
articles.description: A Brazilian-Spanish couple, travelling through Asia on a motorcycle, faced a horrifying ordeal in Jharkhand's Dumka district last week. The woman, a vlogger, was gang-raped while her partner was beaten. The authorities are investigating the vicious criminal a…
